question: Which DossX solution is best for my needs?
answer: Use AI Chatbot Integration for conversational support, Marketing & Social Suite for automated campaigns, Sales & CRM Accelerator for lead workflows, or choose from our other Packs to fit your goals.

question: How do I integrate DossX into my existing systems?
answer: All DossX bundles connect via API or lightweight SDK. Point our workflows at your apps, configure credentials in the dashboard, and you’re live—no heavy lifting or custom dev required.

question: How is pricing structured and billed?
answer: We offer Starter, Professional, and Enterprise monthly plans. Billing is month-to-month, prorated on upgrades/downgrades, and you can cancel anytime without penalty.

question: What’s the typical onboarding timeline?
answer: Most clients go from sign-up to production in under a week. We handle setup, configuration, and a kickoff call—your first automated workflows can be live within 3–5 days.

question: Can you build custom workflows beyond the prebuilt packs?
answer: Absolutely. Every plan includes email & chat support for customizations. Our Professional and Enterprise tiers add dedicated strategy calls and concierge development for bespoke needs.

question: What reporting and analytics are included?
answer: All plans include a real-time dashboard tracking runs, agent performance, and key KPIs like lead volume or invoice cycle time. Professional & Enterprise get advanced SLAs and usage reports.
